de.rwth.i9.palm.persistence

Interface GenericDAO<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AuthorAliasDAO, AuthorDAO, AuthorInterestDAO, AuthorInterestProfileDAO, AuthorSourceDAO, CircleDAO, CircleInterestDAO, CircleInterestProfileDAO, CircleWidgetDAO, ConfigDAO, ConfigPropertyDAO, CountryDAO, EventDAO, EventGroupDAO, ExtractionServiceDAO, ExtractionServicePropertyDAO, FunctionDAO, InstitutionDAO, InterestDAO, InterestProfileDAO, InterestProfilePropertyDAO, LocationDAO, PublicationAuthorDAO, PublicationDAO, PublicationFileDAO, PublicationHistoryDAO, PublicationSourceDAO, PublicationTopicDAO, RoleDAO, SessionDataSetDAO, SourceDAO, SourcePropertyDAO, SubjectDAO, UserDAO, UserRequestDAO, UserWidgetDAO, WidgetDAO

    public interface GenericDAO<T>
    Generic interface for DAOs (Data Access Object), which defines some basic methods to access objects of type .

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int countTotal() 
      boolean delete(T entity)
      Deletes entity.
      List<T> getAll()
      Returns a list of all objects.
      T getById(String id)
      Returns the object by id.
      void insert(T entity) 
      T persist(T entity)
      Persists or updates entity.

    • Method Detail

      • getById

        T getById(String id)
        Returns the object by id. With id is meant the technical id of an object by means of the physical data storage that is used. This id is not considered as the functional identifier of an object of type T. For instance, in case a relational database is used the id could be a uuid.
        Parameters:
        id -
        lock -
        Returns:
